title: 1-minute Breathing
text: Inhale for 4, hold for 4, exhale for 6. Repeat.

title: Micro Learning: Focus
text: Switching tasks can reduce productivity by up to 40%.

title: Useful Fact
text: A 2-minute stretch can refresh your attention span.

title: Tip: Phone Placement
text: Keep your phone face-down and out of reach during focus mode.

title: Deep Work
text: Block notifications to guard your focus for 25 minutes.

title: Pomodoro
text: 25 minutes focus + 5 minutes break builds momentum.
